title: org.hibernate.MappingException: No Dialect mapping for JDBC type: 1111

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

Hello. When i use hibernate type as a dependency。but i got this warning in quarkus 2.13.3.Final.
How can I to solve this. I had saw [21129](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/21129)
It said it solve in 2.4.1. But When i use 2.13.3 i already got this exception. my entity is like this.
```java
@TypeDef(name = "json", typeClass = JsonType.class)
public class BaseEntity extends PanacheEntityBase implements Serializable, Cloneable {

    @Type(type = "json")
    @Getter
    @Setter
    @Column
    private Map<String, String> extProperties = Maps.newConcurrentMap();

   

}

```


### Expected behavior

嗯

### Actual behavior

_No response_

_No response_
